mutants.code:
def insertion_sort(arr):
    comparisons = 1
    for i in range(1, len(arr)):
        key = arr[i]
        j = i - 1
        while j >= 0 and key < arr[j]:
            comparisons += 1
            arr[j + 1] = arr[j]
            j -= 1
        arr[j + 1] = key
    return comparisons

def insertion_sort(arr):
    comparisons = -1
    for i in range(1, len(arr)):
        key = arr[i]

            comparisons += 1

            j -= 1
        arr[j + 1] = key
